column4: Howdy all! How do I make Unity launcher icons launch with options (e.g.: Matlab cannot lauch with command "matlab", must have option "matlab -glnx86")
I believe there's a .desktop file somewhere - where depends on how the program in question was installed.  Edit it.  More info on how you installed matlab would let me help you more.
that may be enough info for me. Do I open up the .desktop file in a text editor?
/usr/share/menu, possibly?  I'm not entirely sure, TBH.
